q: Italia' "We are getting closer and closer to the workers in the Charlie Chaplin movies," said Nina Leone, 47, a Fiat employee since 1988 and who said she would oppose the deal. I don't think Mirafiori will stop auto production if the No vote prevails. We will fight to keep our jobs. Mirafiori is part of Sergio Marchionne 's 20 billion-euro investment project dubbed "Fabbrica Italia" to revamp Fiat's five remaining Italian car plants excluding Termini Imerese, which will stop producing cars by the end of 2011

Allen Iverson , playing with an injured big toe, scored 44 points, including 30 in the final 19 minutes, as the Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Toronto Raptors 106-93 Wednesday night in a preview of a potential first-round series in the Eastern Conference playoffs. "When you have that type of quality player come in, you want to step it up, Allen Iverson said. "When you add to that he's coming into my house, I want to play good in front of my fans. it, and popped out in time for the six o'clock news to say they had discovered no further evidence," he told BBC1's The Politics Show. The prime minister's spokesman said today: The position at the present time is that the Crown Prosecution Service are carrying out an assessment of the information that is held by the Metropolitan police. That process is under way and it is up to the CPS to make a decision on their assessment. The prime minister's position is that if there are allegations of illegal behaviour, then those allegations need to be taken very seriously, but in all cases it is a matter for the police and the CPS.
